product_title: Godrej 2024 Model 5-In-1-Convertible Cooling 1.4 Ton 3 Star Split Inverter Heavy Duty Cooling At Extreme Temperature AC  - White  (AC 1.4T EI 17TINV3R32 RYQ, Copper Condenser)
product_highlights: 1.4 Ton 3 Star BEE Rating 2024 : For energy savings upto 15% (compared to Non-Inverter 1 Star) Auto Restart:  No need to manually reset the settings post power-cut Copper : Energy efficient, best in class cooling with easy maintenance.
product_description: The Godrej 1.4-ton Split Inverter AC offers advanced features like 5-in-1 Convertible Cooling for energy-efficient, tailored comfort, and i-Sense Technology for automatic temperature adjustments based on the environment. Its sleek hidden display adds elegance, while the anti-freeze thermostat ensures durability. The Blue Fin anti-corrosive technology protects against rust, and the 100% copper condenser enhances cooling efficiency. The eco-friendly R32 refrigerant reduces environmental impact. With silent operation, heavy-duty cooling up to 52°C, and self-diagnosis for easy troubleshooting, this AC provides comfort, reliability, and eco-friendliness, making it an ideal choice for modern homes and offices.

product_title: Godrej 2025 Model 5-In-1-Convertible Cooling 1.5 Ton 3 Star Split Inverter With Heavy Duty Cooling And Pure Air Filter AC  - White  (AC 1.5T EI 18P3T WZT, Copper Condenser)
product_highlights: 1.5 Ton 3 Star BEE Rating 2025 : For energy savings upto 15% (compared to Non-Inverter 1 Star) Auto Restart:  No need to manually reset the settings post power-cut Copper : Energy efficient, best in class cooling with easy maintenance.
product_description: The Godrej 5-in-1 Convertible Split Inverter AC offers versatile cooling with its adjustable 40% to 110% cooling power, ensuring maximum comfort and energy efficiency. Additionally, equipped with the I-sense technology, it automatically adapts to the surrounding temperature for optimal comfort. The AC also features an Anti-dust filter that removes fine particles, an Anti-freeze thermostat to prevent system damage, and an Anti-microbial Self-clean function to inhibit harmful microorganism growth. Plus, its copper condenser and R32 refrigerant ensure long-lasting performance and eco-friendliness. Furthermore, the AC operates quietly, delivers heavy-duty cooling even in extreme heat, and includes a Self-diagnosis function for easy troubleshooting.

product_description: Upgrade your cooling experience with Panasonic's latest Air Conditioners. The converti7 feature allows you to customize across 7 stages of cooling performance, ensuring optimal comfort and energy efficiency. With Powerful Mode, your space cools rapidly, even on the hottest days. Shield Blu+ technology adds an anti-corrosive coating to both indoor and outdoor unit coils, preventing leakage and doubling the life of heat exchangers. The Crystal Clean feature self-cleans by removing dirt from the evaporator coils, ensuring better cooling and air quality.
